snippet: Kenny Perry eagled the last hole after waiting out a thunderstorm to take a one-shot lead after the second round of the Champions Tour’s 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn.
abstract: Kenny Perry takes second-round lead at the Champions Tour’s 3M Championship golf tournament in Blaine, Minn; other golf results noted.
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry eagled the last hole after waiting out a thunderstorm to take a one-shot lead after the second round of the Champions Tour’s 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn.

headline.main: Perry Opens Slim Lead at 3M Championship
headline.print_headline: Perry Opens Slim Lead at 3M Championship
